page.title: 06SHOPPING
page.content: In{Harthill}there are lots of shops. In the{Supermarket}there are some groceries,beer off, sweets and tights.At the{Laundrette}people take their clothes to be washed.In the{ {Bakery}they sell bread,cakes,and pies. The{Hairdressers}are called Hair Design. Mrs. Fiddler owns the Hairdressers. They do ear piercing, and hair products.{Powis'}They sell hard ware.The people who own the{Post {Office}are Mr&Mrs Dobson. They give out Pensions and Girobank books and cards.They sell stamps,stationary,celebration cards,toys and sweets.The{Butchers}is owned by Mr.Walker.He sells meat and pies.The{Newsagents}is owned by Mr.M.Straw.He sells sweets and comics,papers,magazines,cigarettes, cards,fruit.
